name: Feeding America
description: Works to end hunger in the United States through a network of food banks and meal programs.

name: United Way Worldwide
description: Supports communities in health, education, and financial stability through local organizations.

name: Goodwill Industries International
description: Provides job training and employment services to individuals facing barriers to employment.

name: Salvation Army USA
description: Offers a range of social services, including food assistance, shelter, and disaster relief.

name: National Alliance to End Homelessness
description: Works to prevent and end homelessness in the United States through policy and advocacy.

name: CARE USA
description: Fights global poverty and provides disaster relief and healthcare services.

name: Save the Children USA
description: Supports children's education, health, and safety worldwide, including the United States.

name: American Red Cross
description: Provides disaster relief, blood donation, and health and safety training services.

name: Children's Defense Fund
description: Advocates for policies and programs to ensure every child has a healthy start in life.

name: Habitat for Humanity International
description: Builds safe, decent, and affordable housing for those in need worldwide.

name: Feeding Children Everywhere
description: Works to end childhood hunger through meal packing and distribution programs.

name: Mercy Corps
description: Provides humanitarian aid and supports communities in crisis around the world.

name: City Harvest
description: Rescues and delivers surplus food to help feed those in need in New York City.

name: National Council on Aging
description: Advocates for older adults and provides resources to improve their health and economic security.

name: National Diaper Bank Network
description: Supports organizations providing diapers and other basic needs to families in need.

name: LIFT (Lifting Individuals and Families Together)
description: Empowers individuals to break the cycle of poverty through coaching and support.

name: Share Our Strength
description: Works to end childhood hunger in America through advocacy and partnerships.

name: National Community Action Foundation
description: Supports community action agencies in their efforts to fight poverty and improve communities.

name: National Urban League
description: Advocates for economic empowerment and social justice for African Americans and underserved communities.

name: Bread for the World
description: Advocates for policies to end hunger and poverty in the United States and around the world.
